message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly enhance your needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's valued at $150 by me. Considering its worth to you might be around $100, I propose a fair deal where you can acquire it for $120. This way, you save $30 compared to its value to you, and I ensure to receive a fair return for my investment. I look forward to your positive response.
